tool_description: Looking for the most cost-effective solution to supercharge your AI-powered SQL queries? Look no further!

api_list.name: Suggest Indexes for a SQL Query
api_list.description: Suggests optimal indexes for a given SQL query to improve performance.

api_list.name: Generate a SQL Query
api_list.description: Generates a SQL query based on user input or requirements.

api_list.name: Explain a SQL Query
api_list.description: Provides an explanation of a given SQL query, detailing its components and functionality.

api_list.name: Optimize a SQL Query
api_list.description: Optimizes a SQL query to enhance its performance and efficiency.
